This document includes screenshots of my preferred RStudio configuration. It heavily relies on this [post](https://drdoane.com/my-rstudio-configuration/) by William Diane. Details about the different options can be found [here](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200549016-Customizing-RStudio).
